phobia accepts the hospitality of Magmatron and begins work on his 
ship.It takes him quite some time to finish and the events that took 
place in my absence happened to get caught up.(So magmatron doesn't 
have to be two places at once).
(Who's assigned to watch Phobia?)

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, Dachande85@a... wrote:
> ::Magmatron::
> 
>     "Yes of course, I will allow you to have acess to all my repair 
tools, 
> but be warned you will be under watch." Magmatron said. He then 
showed 
> Phobias to the area for matenance and then went to his quarters. He 
decided 
> to take a nap. On his bed he couldn't help but hink of what had 
happened 
> since he had arrived. He was starting to get tired of the Beast 
Wars, but he 
> had a mission, he couldn't let anything stop him.
